Very soft, fits well and flattering in the shoulder area due to the sleeve embellishments. The quality is nice and it’s on the thinner side but nice for cool weather and a good layer for cold weather.

This shirt is adorable. It’s classy looking and it fits really well. The material is super soft! I’m currently 137-140 lbs (5’7”) and while the medium does fit me, I would have prefered the large.  It is definitely a slim fit, as described in listing.  Color is nice, shirt washed fine, it’s just tighter than I prefer.

评论概述: They're not just pretty; they're incredibly soft too.
评论详情: BONITEE Women's Long Sleeve Ruffle Tops are the perfect blend of style and comfort for fall. These trendy round neck tees feature a casual ribbed design and a slim fit, making them a great addition to your fall wardrobe for 2024. They're not just pretty; they're incredibly soft too.

评论概述: Casual cute top with raffle sleeves!
评论详情: It is a slim-fit, but stretches well so I can wear it very comfortably.  It looks casual, and cute with the raffle sleeves.  The raffles do not necessarily stand up due to the soft material. It goes well with both office pants or jeans.

This a great top! It is soft and stretchy but doesn’t lose its shape. I love the ribbed fabric. It would be great for layering. The ruffle detail on the shoulders is a very nice detail as well. I’m wearing it with jeans for a more casual look, but it would be a great work top too with some slacks or dressier pants. I plan to get it in navy too.
This top is super flattering and I love the fit and ruffles of the sleeve.

This has a very nice vneck to it. I don’t like ordering a vneck and it only showing my collarbones. The ruffles make it a little more than just a Tshirt which I love. The material is stretchy soft I feel like cotton blend. and has held its white color nice with regular washing.. I ordered a large and I’m usually a medium/large and it’s tight! 36B 150lbs 5’5”

I just got this blouse, and I’m loving how trendy and comfortable it is!  The ruffle detail adds a cute, feminine touch, and the slim-fit ribbed material gives it a flattering look. It’s lightweight but still perfect for fall weather.  The round neck design is simple yet stylish, making it easy to dress up or down depending on the occasion. I’ve already worn it a few times, and it goes great with both jeans and skirts.  It’s a versatile and fashionable piece that’s perfect for the fall season!

评论概述: Stylish upgrade to a basic top
评论详情: I got this for my GF and here is her review: What a great addition to my wardrobe! The navy fitted ribbed long sleeve shirt with ruffles at the shoulder is both chic and versatile, making it a fantastic update to the classic basic top. The standout feature is how the ruffles lay perfectly on the shoulders, adding a touch of elegance and interest without creating bulk. Instead of feeling frumpy, the ruffles provide a flattering frame for the shoulders and neckline, elevating the overall look. I opted to size up for a more relaxed fit and I am glad I did. The shirt maintains a fitted appearance while providing enough room to move comfortably. The ribbed texture adds an additional layer of sophistication, making it suitable for both casual and dressier occasions. The shirt would look great with a statement necklace and tailored trousers for a polished office look or with jeans for a laid-back weekend outing. The combination of style and comfort makes it a step up from a basic top. If you are looking to add some flair to your everyday wear, this shirt is a top recommendation. I can already tell I will be reaching for this often in the upcoming months.

评论概述: Very slim fit and also very much like the product photo
评论详情: BONITEE Women's Long Sleeve Ruffle Tops Fall Trendy Round Neck Tee Shirts Casual Ribbed Slim Fit Knit Tank Blouse 2024 checks a lot of boxes for me.  The "blackish green" is a perfect grown-up Christmas green, as I wanted a top to wear to holiday gatherings that felt festive but not over the top. The shoulder ruffles are the main event, and they do attract attention. The cut of the top is simple, like any long sleeve tee you have.  Except this is much more fitted. I am more of a XS, about 5' tall and 95 lbs. This top clings mightily. You can feel every percentage of spandex content, sucking the air out of you. I can see from the product photo that this is not a "loose top" situation, but when it's on... it is snug. I'll be careful to air dry this.
Super cute and fits well. However, taking it on and off I can hear seams ripping even with a little pull. It is made cheaply.
It’s a stretchy but spandex type stretch rib knit fabric. Which makes it drape nicely and hold its shape during washes etc. fits as expected, and is so flattering!

The sizing was perfect and my daughter wears a small normally and this small fit her perfectly. The color is also exactly as described but the design could have been better. The ruffles on the shoulders don’t even really show even after ironing and trying to fix the look of the shirt. It is very stretchy though and it has a good stretch to it. The shirt is very comfortable and is nice when worn.

评论概述: Seller can't do a size chart accurately, but this is a super cute top
评论详情: MY pet peeve of amazon sellers is the size chart.  If you sell clothes, please, hire someone who truly understands US sizing.  35.4 bust for a large.  I am normally a large, so I opted for that, and honestly, it's very fitted, I don't mind that.  Some may.  My bust measures 38".  The ruffle detail on the shoulders is cuter than I expected.  Fabric is ribbed, but a tight one, and it looks nice.  Fabric is soft, and it is well constructed.  A great price, just know the size chart is not accurate.

评论概述: Really comfortable t-shirt, flattering and stylish for Fall.
评论详情: Love the way this shirt looked online so ordered it to give it a try. It is incredibly comfortable and flattering to my arms and torso. The fluffed shoulders are the new Fall style and I love the look to accompany with my jeans. I washed in cold water, delicate, and light tumble dry and saw no change in quality. Very happy with it!

This top fits as expected. I love that it can be dressed up or dressed down. The material is stretchy and comfortable. The ruffled shoulders make a great statement. This top is easy to pair with all different types of pants. The material is great for fall weather.

I like this shirt. I wish I would have sized up in order to have it fit a little looser. I am 5’4 and weight between 139-135 and the medium fits snug to the skin. It has so much stretch! It is a nice shirt, I just like mine a little looser.

评论概述: Perfect addition to my fall wardrobe
评论详情: I love, love, love this shirt. It's unbelievably soft and looks even better in person. The fabric is higher end, and the proportions are perfect.  I especially love the puff sleeves. They're just the right size to make a statement without looking silly, and they hold their form well even after washing. I'd recommend hang drying for this piece to avoid shrinkage and pilling.  For reference, I'm 5" 5' and 140 lbs. The Large fits perfectly - form-fitting but not too tight.
It did not fit as recommended. Product was returned and was still charged for returned product.

I love this feminine, adorable top with ruffled shoulders! It is a slim fit stretch knit, not sheer but not heavy either, in a rayon spandex blend. I got it Navy in size small, which is my usual size. This casual top with ruffles is a fun, flirty style without being overdone that I would get again.
The material is nice. lightweight and comfortable. The ruffles were too long to sit up like they do in the pic and the material is too soft to iron them in place. This was a miss for me.

I absolutely love this blouse!  I was looking for a black blouse with ruffles around the shoulders and this blouse is exactly what I was looking for!  The material is soft and slightly stretchy, which gives it a very comfortable fit.  And the ruffles are very stylish and classy, with a feminine and sophisticated look!  The blouse is also well made and the material is high quality.What's also great about this blouse is that it is the type of blouse that you can wear with a skirt, as well as dress pants, or jeans.  And it looks great with all of them!I'm so glad that I got this blouse, as it is a great addition to my wardrobe.  And I love it so much that I may purchase another one in a different color.  I highly recommend this blouse!

I recently ordered this lovely and very soft top, and it's both great quality and very stylish. I appreciate that it's stretchy, allowing for plenty of movement and accommodating different body sizes. If you would prefer a looser fit, I recommend sizing up, but otherwise, it fits true to size. I chose the navy blue color shown in the product video, and it looks really nice. I've already paired it with dressy pants, jeans, and even under a jacket, and it worked well with each outfit, speaking to its versatility. One thing to note is that the sleeves in the first picture appear stiffer and more prominent than they actually are in real life. In actuality, the sleeves lay flatter like they do in the product video. I wish they had the more pronounced look shown in the advertised picture, but again, that's not the case, and the sleeve ruffles lay more flat over the shoulder. This is something to keep in mind if you were hoping for a more tapered and distinct shoulder look. Despite that, I recommend this top as a beautiful and versatile addition to your wardrobe.

Love this shirt!  The material is stretchy and fairly thick.  It fits true to size.  I ordered the navy top and it's a true navy.  I love the ruffles at the shoulder--looks very good on.  The sleeves are long on me but easily folded up.  I washed and dried it in my machines--no shrinkage or wrinkles.  Very reasonable price.  My only complaint is that I ordered it on Aug. 15 and received it on Sept. 9--but worth waiting for.  We're just so used to getting everything from Amazon quickly.

This a nicely made but very slim cut long sleeve crew neck top. The crew neck as well as the rest of the blouse are nicely constructed. The double row of ruffles hang off the shoulders and remind me of fun epaulets. They add a nice dimension to the fitted blouse.    Definitely read the sizing before ordering. At 5’3” and 105 lbs I have a slender petite build. I recommend carefully reading the size chart if you’re confused about what size to order. The sizes listed are for a very fitted blouse.    I ordered a medium and the blouse is definitely fitted but not too tight. The medium to heavier weight rayon and spandex “ribbed” fabric has a lot of stretch so you can wear it fitted or really tight.  Ordering up to medium did make the sleeves a little long for me. But that’s not really a problem for a casual top in the cooler months.    I decided to launder the blouse to get wrinkles out before wearing. The black blouse did well with no color loss. It washes and dries very well, with no ironing required. The instruction said lie flat to dry. Instead, I tossed the blouse in the dryer on low setting for several minutes to get the wrinkles out and hung it up to dry the rest of the way.  Great results with no wrinkles or shrinking.    This blouse is a good value for a casual comfy fitted long sleeve blouse.
Comfortable and flattering, with stylish details.  Nice ruffled shoulders, length and width were standard for a small.  Bold color.

评论概述: Summer Style with Comfort and Elegance
评论详情: This top with ruffles and ribs is so adorable. The fabric is incredibly soft, feels featherlight, and breathes remarkably well, all of which contribute to its wonderful quality and make it a pleasure to wear. My top feels soft on the skin due to the elastic material, and I can move freely thanks to the snug fit.  With its sophisticated ruffle sleeves that elevate any ensemble and its attractive round neck, the design is a masterclass in both style and utility. I adore how effortlessly this top goes with so many different types of bottoms, giving you a stylish, contemporary look that's appropriate for both more formal occasions and everyday wear.  I value the care taken to ensure a perfect fit by including a size chart.

This is a super cute top for the colder days. It’s like basic shirt but the ruffles add a flare to it. It is true to size. I would recommend!

A larger size will make a better appearance. Not sure that I would reorder?

Love this shirt! Fits great… colors vibrant! Comfortable!

My wife recently ordered this shirt, and she has been raving about it ever since! It's the perfect basic shirt that can be dressed up or down, and it's so soft and comfortable that she can wear it all day long.
Washes great and does not irritate my skin like so many tops I have purchased online.
Comfortable to wear for everyday look. Good material.
Nice quality and very chic top. Must try. Looks trendy n super comfy fit too.
I love this navy blue top. It is so pretty. The ruffle shoulders is favorite part. It is so soft and the shirt is great quality

This top fits perfectly On me. I’m about 5’2 and 100 pounds. I ordered a small. I like the color a lot. I always get compliments on this color. It does have a stretchy feel to the shirt and the ruffle sleeves add some fun to the top. My only complaint is that after washing it twice the stitching around the bottom was coming undone. I cut the loose ends and I’m hoping it holds up for a while longer.
Love the material and the color combo. Looks good with light blue jeans.  It’s good quality material and stretchable too.

I was pleasantly surprised with this too. It looks cute in person and fits great. The material is soft and breathable which will be great in the summer months. I also really like the ruffle sleeves. I typically wear a small but I sized up with this top and the medium for me perfectly.
Cute top. Great for business casual attire in warmer temps and also looks good with jeans.

It's been hard looking for a white blouse with ruffles like this because most of them felt super cheap like an actual t-shirt that's way too thin that it's see-through. I got good news on these though! This has a nice knit fabric to it so it's not super thick but it feels super soft and nice on skin and not see-through. The sleeves are quite short, almost looks like a tank top on the sides. Very cute!!

This shirt is 95% rayon and 5% spandex. Rayon is so much more soft and comfortable than polyester. Not only is the shirt comfy, I also love the ruffled cap sleeves and deeper V neckline with a high back. The contrasting border around the neckline is a nice touch as well.  I ordered the Small size. A perfect fit for me at 5’2” and about 105 pounds.  I machine wash the shirt on a light wash and hang it to air dry. It is made in China.

评论概述: Adorable, but the ruffle sleeves aren't even
评论详情: I love the wide, deep V with the flutter sleeves. The red trim against the navy blue is such a cute combo. The fabric is a nice medium weight with some stretch and it's not too long on my short frame. My only complaint is that the ruffled sleeves don't lie the same. The inside seams where they attach to the shirt are kind of wide. I noticed one was angled towards my neck and the other outward. When I flipped them to both lie the same way, it helped, but the sleeves still weren't fully symmetrical. Not sure most people would even notice, but I am crazy picky when it comes to fit. I am hoping it will resolve once washed. However, even if it doesn't, I will still wear this shirt because it's so cute.  For reference, I'm 5'3", 135lbs, 32DD, 27" waist, 39" hips (hourglass). I normally wear a S or M in tops and a 6-8/M in bottoms. I ordered a small and it fits perfect. If you are between sizes, I recommend sizing down.

Wifey says the top is a little transparent; the white color bra shows underneath.  The top fits her fine and is a little stretchy.  The ruffles don't stay put; she has to straighten them to make them look smoother.  Overall, she's ok with the top, but it's not the best quality or style.  She gives it 3.5 stars.
Love this shirt, can dress up or down. Used for wedding and it looked very elegant. Very comfortable and stretchy (but fitted).
This shirt is made of a nice, thicker material that is very stretchy and forgiving. It fits well and is a bright green color as pictured. It’s a good value, and I may buy other colors!
